import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import "./RecargarSaldoPagina.scss" import Navbar from '../components/Navbar/Navbar' import Footer from '../components/Footer/Footer' import CheckoutStripe from '../components/Cart/Checkout' const RecargarSaldoPagina = () => { //Initializing Variables and States let cart = []; const [paymentMethodSelected, setPaymentMethodSelected] = useState(false) const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState("") const [cartTotal, setCartTotal] = useState() const handleProductClick= async (id) => { const selectedProduct = await items.find(product => product.id === id) await cart.push(selectedProduct) calculateTotal(cart) } const calculateTotal = () => { let newCartTotal = 0; cart.forEach(product => { console.log(product.total, 'Total producto') newCartTotal += product.total }) setCartTotal(newCartTotal) } const items = [ {id:100, total: 200}, {id:101, total: 1000}, {id:102, total: 10000} ] return (
